books.title: The Lean Product Playbook
books.author: Dan Olsen
books.blurb: A practical guide that helped me structure my approach to product development. The value proposition framework is something I use regularly.

books.title: The Psychology of Money
books.author: Morgan Housel
books.blurb: Changed my perspective on wealth building and financial decision making. The concept of room for error has influenced my approach to personal finance.

books.title: 10% Happier
books.author: Dan Harris
books.blurb: A skeptic's journey into meditation and mindfulness, offering practical insights into managing stress and improving mental clarity.

books.title: Inspired: How to Create Tech Products Customers Love
books.author: Marty Cagan
books.blurb: Changed my perspective on product management. The emphasis on customer problems over solutions has deeply influenced my product thinking.

books.title: Football, Bloody Hell!: The Biography of Alex Ferguson
books.author: Patrick Barclay
books.blurb: A fascinating look into the mind of one of football's greatest managers. His leadership principles and resilience in building successful teams has been truly inspiring.

books.title: Wings of Fire
books.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam
books.blurb: Dr. Kalam's journey from humble beginnings to becoming India's leading scientist and president is a testament to perseverance and lifelong learning.

books.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.blurb: A thought-provoking exploration of human history that changed my perspective on society, culture, and our collective future.

books.title: The Tipping Point
books.author: Malcolm Gladwell
books.blurb: Fascinating insights into how small changes can have massive impacts. The concepts of connectors and sticky messages influence my approach to product adoption.

books.title: Freakonomics
books.author: Steven D. Levitt, Stephen J. Dubner
books.blurb: A unique way of looking at problem-solving through the lens of incentives. Has influenced how I think about user behavior and motivation.

books.title: The Dalai Lama's Cat
books.author: David Michie
books.blurb: A charming perspective on mindfulness and happiness through the eyes of a cat. Offers valuable lessons on contentment and understanding.
